visuals.name: Aura Orb Hyper-Geometric
visuals.description: Hyper-geometric aura orb with continuous folding and phase shifts tied to BPM and loudness.

visuals.name: Beat Drop Grid
visuals.description: A perspective 50×50 board where randomized tiles flare into neon shapes whenever the drop hits, pulsing color with the beat.

visuals.name: Bio-Digital Entropy
visuals.description: 11-stage fractal engine reacting to audio metrics with seamless transitions.

visuals.name: Bioluminescent Journey
visuals.description: Evolving bioluminescent journey synchronized with song progress. Features drifters and filaments that react to audio.

visuals.name: Centroid Crystalline Tunnel
visuals.description: Kaleidoscopic tunnel woven from crystalline layers where centroid-driven momentum paces the warp and energy accelerates lush color drifts.

visuals.name: Cloud Flight
visuals.description: Audio-reactive cloud flight where camera banking, rolls, and sunlight swell with intense stereo energy and towering dynamics.

visuals.name: Cloud Tunnel Raymarch
visuals.description: Volumetric cloud tunnel inspired by Shadertoy classics, pushing clouds faster with song energy while hues and shapes morph with timbre and drops.

visuals.name: Color Vortex Suck
visuals.description: A 3D tunnel of shrinking color snapshots that twist into the void.

visuals.name: Colors
visuals.description: A 3D domain-warped, spatially folded field with red/blue faction lighting and time-driven spatial breaks.

visuals.name: Complicating Things
visuals.description: Layered kaleidoscopic “Complicating things even further” -mrange

visuals.name: Cozy Apartment Vinyl Session
visuals.description: A warm apartment corner with a spinning record and neon TV glow that gently reacts to the music.

visuals.name: Cyber Punk Punch
visuals.description: Cyber Punk Punch :D

visuals.name: Debug HUD
visuals.description: Audio metrics HUD for inspecting the full analysis stream.

visuals.name: Deep House Velvet Drift
visuals.description: Velvet neon ribbons and liquid halos that breathe with deep-house basslines, with tempo-locked pulses and long, silky trails.

visuals.name: Deep House
visuals.description: A raymarching visual inspired by Deep House music with fractal tunnels and energy-reactive lighting, evolving through distinct system states.

visuals.name: Disolve
visuals.description: Recursive space folding with morphing primitives, driven by bass pulses and spectral flux for a slow-breathing, dissolving tunnel.

visuals.name: Droste Temple
visuals.description: Infinite mirrored corridor loops through a droste temple; bass eases the zoom, centroid drift bends the hallway, high-end orbit paints the doors.

visuals.name: Echo Halo
visuals.description: A living halo of rings that remembers the music, with each pulse drifting outward like a fading echo.

visuals.name: EDM Show
visuals.description: Festival lasers, morphing blobs, and crowd-shaking bursts tuned for mainstage drops.

visuals.name: Endless Road
visuals.description: Neon motorway perspective tuned for drops stereo-swaying lanes with shockwaves racing to the horizon on impact.

visuals.name: Energy Unlocked
visuals.description: Lets unlocked that energy within

visuals.name: Fractal Symphony Bloom
visuals.description: Max trippy fractal vortex with intense color cycling and screen ripple.

visuals.name: Galactic Kaleidoscope
visuals.description: A kaleidoscope that has been to space and back.

visuals.name: Glitch Matrix
visuals.description: Cyberpunk rain of characters with glitch ripples and digital sparks.

visuals.name: Groove
visuals.description: Temporal feedback currents with beat-toggled drift and volume-steered vertical flow.

visuals.name: Guess What
visuals.description: Audio-reactive geometric chaos engine with folded SDF scenes, spark streaks, and scene-to-scene morphs.

visuals.name: Hash Core Atrium
visuals.description: Primary-colored hash bloom that pulses, twists, and thickens to the music.

visuals.name: Hyperspace Tunnel
visuals.description: Enhanced hyperspace tunnel with chromatic aberration, particle stars, glowing rings, and intense audio-reactive effects that pulse and warp through space.

visuals.name: Hypno Spiral
visuals.description: Concentric memory rings rotate outward while bass pulses bloom softly.

visuals.name: Hpno Vortex Illusion
visuals.description: Hypnotic sacred-geometry vortex packed with choir harmonics and orbiting sparks.

visuals.name: Kaleidoscope Tunnel
visuals.description: Hypnotic kaleidoscope tunnel with audio-driven speed and color shifts. Centroid controls tunnel layer velocity, energy modulates color shift tempo.

visuals.name: Kali Neon Horizon
visuals.description: Cathedral-scale neon vistas that bend and shimmer with the music, bass tilts the horizon, treble paints laser ridges, and stereo swirl warps the sky portal.

visuals.name: Koi Pond
visuals.description: WebfGL koi glide through a rippling pond; bass pushes rings, treble drifts the hue, and stereo steers the school.

visuals.name: Lava Lamp
visuals.description: Warm yellow-orange-red metaballs drifting and fusing, matching the provided GPU lava lamp reference.

visuals.name: Liminal Space Folding
visuals.description: Liminal space folding corridor with recursive frames and neon fog drift.

visuals.name: Liquid Kaleido Feedback
visuals.description: Liquid kaleidoscopic feedback tunnel with mirrored shards, dye trails, and drop-driven blooms—built to scratch the Butterchurn itch.

visuals.name: Lock In
visuals.description: Lock in - AIM bot tactical simulator

visuals.name: Lunar Dragon Fireworks
visuals.description: A lunar dragon ascends in ember trails and radiant bursts, with audio-guided firework arcs and shimmering crackle glow.

visuals.name: Memory Spiral
visuals.description: Celestial pulse spiral with aura orbits and motes that weave emotion into evolving tapestries.

visuals.name: Neon Fold Odyssey
visuals.description: Eight-phase neon fold odyssey: a calm raymarched tunnel of shifting SDF forms with audio-driven glow and hue drift.

visuals.name: Neon Space Fold
visuals.description: Advanced audio-reactive 3D space folding. Bass drives propulsion, while overall loudness controls the geometric breathing/expansion.

visuals.name: Neon Tunnel Kaleidoscope
visuals.description: Neon tunnel kaleidoscope that slices the beat into electric shards.

visuals.name: Neural Constellation
visuals.description: Neural lattice of glowing axons, synapse pulses, and traversal couriers.

visuals.name: Neural Flow
visuals.description: Procedural neural tunnel with reactive core, particle drift, and audio-driven shader deformation.

visuals.name: Parallax Starfields
visuals.description: Layered starfields race past wispy nebula sheets with camera sway, stereo parallax, and chroma bursts.

visuals.name: Particle Swarm Ballet
visuals.description: Particle Swarm Ballet: A living, shape shifting, glowing swarm that dances in perfect sync with the music

visuals.name: Polar Tilt Grid
visuals.description: A polar mosaic of tiles that rise and shimmer with the music beats ignite the grid, centroid swings the palette, and stereo tilt bends the field.

visuals.name: Prismatic Kaleidoscope
visuals.description: Prismatic wheel of mirrored shards organic ink, aurora ribbons, and crystalline bursts that bloom with beats and stereo ripple.

visuals.name: Psychadelic Trail
visuals.description: A psychedelic forest trail that decays into the void. Use WASD to move around and Mouse to tilt.

visuals.name: Pulse Warp Tunnel
visuals.description: Raymarched chrome tunnel that shudders, pulses, and blooms in sync with beats while timbre bends its colors and stereo tilt leans the vortex.

visuals.name: Pulsed Ripple Grid
visuals.description: A top-down ripple grid where beats fire shockwaves. Energy, bass, and flux reshape the crest height, speed, and sparkles.

visuals.name: Mercury Core
visuals.description: A living mercury core that twists, boils, and ignites into shrapnel on every beat, featuring a dynamic camera that orbits during the drop.

visuals.name: Retro Windows Dreamscape
visuals.description: Neon tunnel morphs like classic Windows visualizers, blending prismatic ribbons with audio-reactive vortex pulses.

visuals.name: Ring Runner
visuals.description: Clean concentric rings that evolve into a warped tunnel as you fly through.

visuals.name: Serpent Of Harmony
visuals.description: Mythic serpent woven from intertwining sine spines, iridescent scales, and drifting skin veils that answer every bass swell and treble shimmer.

visuals.name: Shadow-Lit Forge
visuals.description: Cathedral pillars, a hovering core, and fractal forge cracks that ignite with audio-driven impact waves.

visuals.name: A Smoke
visuals.description: Dense plumes and iridescent ribbons that react to every swell, from gentle exhales to drop-sized shockwaves.

visuals.name: Sound Weaver
visuals.description: Luminous lattice of threads weaving pulses and ripples in endless motion.

visuals.name: Spin Contour
visuals.description: Facet-cut tunnel echoes the provided shader with smooth raymarched cubes that accelerate with volume and glow on loudness lifts.

visuals.name: Im ready
visuals.description: A raymarching dance party with a certain sponge

visuals.name: Star Traveling
visuals.description: Warp-speed starfield with comet trails and nebula blooms around a spinning core.

visuals.name: Summoning Rings
visuals.description: Rings spawn from the edges, pulse with singing/treble energy, converge when 9 are present, then explode into a brief crazy scene.

visuals.name: Swirling Colors
visuals.description: A nice gentle melting pot of swirling colors.

visuals.name: The Eye
visuals.description: A visualizer inspired by an eye, reacting to audio features.

visuals.name: The Gambler
visuals.description: Audio-reactive triangular plinko run volume rises drop neon balls, pegs scramble their paths, edge jackpots blast shockwaves across the board.

visuals.name: The Infinite Grid
visuals.description: Cyan grids warp under sub-bass pressure, storing dents that redirect ripples while drops raise spires along the horizon.

visuals.name: The Mountain Range
visuals.description: Acid-green and magenta raymarched mountains with topographic pulses, neon grid ridges, and audio-reactive motion.

visuals.name: UKG Skyline Pulse
visuals.description: A neon skyline that steps with UKG swing. Bass builds the city, off-beats flicker short peaks, and vocal chops arc as light trails.

visuals.name: Winamp Hyperspace
visuals.description: A classic Winamp-style hyperspace tunnel rebuilt in 3D: rainbow ribbons and star streaks that whip forward, flare on drops, and bend with stereo sway.
